title: Managing "STRESSðŸ˜©"as Software Engineer
abstract: Managing stress as a software engineer is crucial for maintaining both your mental well-being and your productivity. This article explores practical strategies and techniques to help developers cope with the unique challenges of the profession.

title: Beginners Guide to Developer Relations
abstract: At its core, Developer Relations is about establishing and maintaining a strong bond between developers and the company's products or services. This comprehensive guide covers the fundamentals of DevRel and how to get started.

title: How to give your site an animated background using particle.js
abstract: Particles.js is a JavaScript library for creating animated, interactive particle backgrounds for web pages. Learn how to implement stunning particle effects to enhance your website's visual appeal.
